slide1.desc: Manage all your ride-hailing and delivery apps in one place. Maximize your earnings by accepting or declining requests based on custom filters, with automatic online/offline switching.

slide2.desc: Save time and reduce distractions with our auto-accept and auto-decline features. Set filters for trip type, fare, and distance to drive smarter, not harder.

slide3.desc: Keep track of your earnings in real-time. Get detailed insights into your hourly rates, earnings per mile, and more, to help you work more efficiently.

setup.loading: Allow us a moment to set <bold>things</bold> up for you.
setup.accessibilityDesc: DriveHub uses the Accessibility API to automate actions in the Driver app, such as tapping <bold>GO</bold> to go online.

points.data: <bold>Data Access:</bold> Drive Hub may interact with the app’s interface.
points.privacy: <bold>Privacy:</bold> Data is used only for automation purposes.
points.control: <bold>Control:</bold> You can disable this feature in the settings.

setup.finalNote: To enable, tap <bold>Open Settings</bold> and activate the Drive Hub Access Service.
